movies.title: Troublesome Night 3
movies.originalTitle: Yin yeung lo 3: Sing goon fat choi
movies.plot: This is the third film in the "Troublesome Night" series, consisting of three loosely-connected segments. Shishedo (Allen Ting), a mortician, is grief-stricken when his favorite singer is killed in a car accident. As a result, he vows to help her get the most "appropriate" burial. Afterward, Shishedo disappears and leaves his co-workers to deal with the ghostly aftermath. In the next segment, Gigi (Christine Ng) wants a memorial service for her departed mother (Lan Law). Seizing the opportunity, Shishedo's co-workers coaxed Gigi into purchasing tons of service materials from them. Upset at the greed, the ghost of Gigi's mother returns to haunt the workers. Lastly, Hung (Fennie Yuen) was dumped by her boyfriend Daviv because the thought of her working at the mortuary doesn't appeal to him. When Hung does the unthinkable to escape the pain, Daviv finds himself facing retribution.
movies.simplePlot: This is the third film in the "Troublesome Night" series, consisting of three loosely-connected segments. Shishedo (Allen Ting), a mortician, is grief-stricken when his favorite singer is ...

biography.bio: Louis Koo was born on October 21, 1970 in Hong Kong as Louis Tin Lok Koo. He is an actor and producer, known for Drug War (2012), Triad Election (2006) and Election (2005).
biography.name: Louis Koo

biography.bio: Fennie Yuen was born on September 15, 1970. She is an actress, known for Tai-Chi Master (1993), Une balle dans la tête (1990) and The Swordsman (1990).
biography.name: Fennie Yuen

biography.bio: Simon Lui was born on July 8, 1964 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and writer, known for Ching ham baak lok moon (2000), Troublesome Night (1997) and Gui qing ni di hu (1999).
biography.name: Simon Lui

biography.bio: Allen Ting was born on May 6, 1974 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Ting Chi-Chun. He is known for his work on Summer Snow (1995), Secrets de Xangai (2011) and Troublesome Night 3 (1998).
biography.name: Allen Ting

biography.bio: Emotion Cheung is an actor, known for Bio-Zombie (1998), Chinese Box (1997) and Meng gui shi ren tai (1998).
biography.name: Emotion Cheung

biography.bio: Kar Lok Chin was born on August 6, 1965 in Hong Kong. He is known for his work on Lust, Caution (2007), The Legend of Drunken Master (1994) and Cold War (2012). He has been married to Angela Ying-Ying Tong since November 13, 2012. They have two children.
biography.name: Kar Lok Chin

biography.bio: Frankie Chi-Hung Ng was born on December 25, 1953 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Chi-Hung Ng. He is an actor and producer, known for Prison on Fire (1987), Hitman (1998) and Trivisa (2016).
biography.name: Frankie Chi-Hung Ng

biography.bio: Michael Tse was born on July 15, 1967 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and composer, known for Turning Point (2009), Turning Point 2 (2011) and Young and Dangerous 3 (1996). He has been married to Tina Lee Tin Yan since 2005.
biography.name: Michael Tse

biography.bio: Christine Ng was born on February 24, 1969. She is an actress, known for Rush Hour (1998), Crime story (1993) and 9413 (1998). She has been married to Kasey Lin Hoi Tong since July 1999.
biography.name: Christine Ng

biography.bio: Helena Law Lan had never married, and her actual name is "LO Yin Ying", but her stage name is "Law Lan", after the Cantonese pronunciation of Sophia Loren's last name. Her family used to be fairly well-off, because her father was a soap merchant who supplied to major hotels in Hong Kong, and the family employed a number of servants at home. However, they lost everything during World War II. Hence she lives simply, and believes that money should be spent wisely and effectively. Despite her age (73 in 2009), she spends a lot of time doing volunteer work, e.g. helping at old people's homes. She has a big sister, six nephews and nieces, and a number of grand-nephews and nieces. During festivals, she has gatherings at her sister's home.
biography.name: Lan Law

biography.bio: Fui-On Shing was born on February 1, 1955 in Hong Kong. He was an actor, known for The Crazy Companies (1988). He died on August 27, 2009 in Hong Kong, China.
biography.name: Fui-On Shing

biography.bio: Rain Lau was born on December 11, 1966 in Hong Kong. She is known for her work on Push (2009), Miao jie huang hou (1990) and Quan wang (1991).
biography.name: Rain Lau

biography.bio: Chi-Ting Au is an actor, known for Troublesome Night 3 (1998).
biography.name: Chi-Ting Au

biography.bio: Helen Poon is an actress, known for The Kid with the Golden Arm (1979), He or She (1976) and Yi ling ba (1978).
biography.name: Helen Poon

biography.bio: Lik-Chi Lee was born in May 1961 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and director, known for Bons baisers de Pékin (1994), Flirting Scholar (1993) and The God of Cookery (1996).
biography.name: Lik-Chi Lee

awards.award: Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards 1999
